title: 116F.02 DEFINITIONS.
text:
As used in sections 116F.01 to 116F.08, the terms defined in this section have the meanings given to them.
"Agency" means the Minnesota Pollution Control Agency.
[Repealed, 1980 c 564 art 13 s 2]
[Repealed, 1980 c 564 art 13 s 2]
[Repealed, 1980 c 564 art 13 s 2]
"Resource recovery system" means any system used for (a) the recovery of materials or energy from solid waste, or for (b) the collection, transportation, separation, sorting, processing or storage of solid materials which aids in the recovery of materials or energy from solid waste.
"Solid waste generation" means that a solid material in its final configuration has fulfilled the purpose for which it was created, cannot be reused in its final configuration, and must be disposed of or recycled into a new or different product.
